about.title: About "Divulgando Ciencia"
about.subtitle: Learn more about our mission and vision.

description.paragraph1: Science is part of everything around us: from the smallest things we cannot see to the big ideas that change the course of the world. However, it is often presented in an inaccessible, technical, or even boring way.
description.paragraph2: At "Divulgando Ciencia", we believe that knowledge should be available to everyone, particularly to those who are just beginning on discovering the world with curiosity.
description.paragraph3: Our mission is to transform the way young people access science: making it approachable, clear, and exciting. We want the understanding of a formula, a discovery, or a theory to be a gateway to wonder, not a source of frustration.
description.paragraph4: That is why we work to connect young people with real scienceâ€”the kind which is experienced, discussed, lived, and shared. Because learning can also be an adventure, and understanding how the world works is one of the most powerful ways to change it.

card1.title: Scientific Articles
card1.description: We explain complex topics in a simple way without losing rigor. From atoms to black holes, we want you to understand the world around you.

card2.title: Open Research
card2.description: Information and knowledge should be free to get, which is why we promote open research and free access to knowledge.

card3.title: Scientific Community
card3.description: A network for sharing ideas, collaborating on projects, and giving visibility to your research, presentations, or scientific creations.

card4.title: Global Access
card4.description: We want to break language and geographical barriers. Our website will be available in multiple languages and adapted to all types of devices.

card5.title: Scientific Store
card5.description: Because science is also a lifestyle, we offer products related to science and scientific communication. Various scientific products, everything you need to live science the fullest.

card6.title: Collaborations
card6.description: Opportunities to collaborate on research projects, publish your articles, and share your discoveries for free.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the passionate people behind this platform.

proyect.title: A project by young people... for young people
proyect.description: Divulgando Ciencia is led by students, like some of you, who want to change the way science is learned and talked about. We are driven by curiosity, enthusiasm, and the desire to show that science can also be creative, fun, and inspiring.
proyect.join: We believe science is not just for textbooks. It is for sharing, questioning, and living.
